name: nice.
description:
Click all of the boxes to make them blue! That's basically it. This project was created in one hour for the One Hour Game Jam so that should explain a lot. 

One Hour Game Jam: https://onehourgamejam.com/?page=main

Leave feedback at: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSehe36E9H74cbwZ3wanliN5gQneo-F_Iww1TarA...
